attributes.action: stop the Royal mail charging under postage payments for  slightly larger christmas cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal mail should stop all such payments  and be instructed to repay any such payments.They and shops selling christmas cards should be compelled to remind shoppers of the new charges for large envelopes and also the shape of small envelopes that seem to fall into this trap.It is not good enough to say some cards show in small print on the back   but this is not good enough.The Royal Mail and card shops and manufacturers are fully aware of this confusion but do nothing as they all reap the benifits of such silence on the topic.Some postal sorting offices charge some do not.Where does the cashh go as the sorting office do not issue receipts
